answers.answer: Yes, it is normal. I have the same issue, especially when trying to watch TV. Thanks to our hormones.....lol. If it becomes too bad, consult your Dr. :)
oh thanks for the info thats my 2nd baby it wasnt like that with the first one may be i am getting old lol
Yeah my eyes go very blurry when watching tv.but lately i can see black dots falling like snow only theyre black.im 36wks.wonder is it something to do, with bloodpressure or sugar levels.
My doctor told me it is not normal, and if I had any vision problems to call/email her and let her know.
Possibly tinkerbella. Sometimes, I think I see bugs crawling. It's weird. You might want to talk to your Dr about that just in case it's something serious.
Could be a sign of gestational diabetes, you should talk to your midwife.

I use to work at a vision centre pregnancy can effect you prescription  but if you are having random symptoms that come a nd go that's not good. Could be blood pressure diabetes different things like that...
Ive been checked for the diabetes and dont have it but will certainly say it to my doc on tues just to be on the safe side.
Omg me too!! Sometimes I see shiny bugs crawling and it's sooo weird !! It only last for a minute tho.... Don't have diabetes or anything,  healthy pregnancy. ...

If u have high bp and you are having blurred vision and seeing spots, that's a sign of preeclampsia. That's LIFE THREATENING. I had it with my son two years ago luckily I'm showing no signs this pregnancy.

question: is it normal during pregnancy   to have a problem with the eyes? i can't see well in a distance or i need glasses
title: my eyes
